gurmukhi: ਕੋੲਿਲਾ ਸੀਤਲ ਕਰ ਕਰਤ ਸਿਅਾਮ ਗਹੇ ਪਰਸ ਤਪਤ ਪਰਦਗਧ ਕਰਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Koilaa Seetal Kar Karat Siaam Gahay , Paras Tapat Paradagadh Karat Hai ?
translation: A burnt out coal when held in hand blackens it but causes burns when held if burning. (Coal is problematic both when cold or burning)

gurmukhi: ਕੂਕਰ ਕੇ ਚਾਟਤ ਕਲੇਵਰਹਿ ਲਾਗੈ ਛੋਤਿ ਕਾਟਤ ਸਰੀਰ ਪੀਰ ਧੀਰ ਨ ਧਰਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Kookar Kay Chaatat Kalayvarahi Laagai Chhoti , Kaatat Sareer Peer Dheer N Dharat Hai ?
translation: Just as dog's lick is contagious and causes unbearable pain when it bites. (Dogs lick and bite both are troublesome).

gurmukhi: ਫੂਟਤ ਜਿੳੁ ਗਾਗਰਿ ਪਰਤ ਹੀ ਪਖਾਨ ਪਰਿ ਪਾਹਨ ਪਰਤਿ ਪੁਨਿ ਗਾਗਰਿ ਹਰਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Dhootat Jiu Gaagari Parat Hee Pakhaan Pari , Paahan Parati Pouni Gaagari Harat Hai ?
translation: Just as a pitcher breaks when dropped on a stone, and it also breaks when stone drops on it. (A stone is destroyer of a pitcher in every way).

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਹੀ ਅਸਾਧ ਸੰਗਿ ਪ੍ਰੀਤ ਹੂ ਬਿਰੋਧ ਬੁਰੋ ਲੋਕ ਪਰਲੋਕ ਦੁਖ ਦੋਖ ਨ ਟਰਤ ਹੈ ॥੩੮੮॥
transliteration: Taisay Hee Asaadh Sangi Preet Hoo Birodh Buro , Lok Paralok Doukh Dokh N Tarat Hai ?388?
translation: So is developing loving relationship with evil-minded persons. Loving him or showing dissent towards him is equally bad. Thus one cannot escape from pain and sufferings of this world and the world hereafter.  (388)
